entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1600 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Snow level 1700 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain or snow near noon. Snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
